ScenarioDescription: Father, mother and their son and daughter want to cross the river
and help an old man with his wife to get to the other side as well.
- the raft can hold a maximum of 2 people
- only father, mother and the old man can row, but the old man refuses to be accompanied on the raft
- the children cannot stay with anyone without one of their parents
- the son can only row with his father and the daughter can only row with her mother

BanksConstraints.DisallowedBankConfigurations: 1+ x child + 0 x parent + 1+ x stranger
